property.name: accountManagerDesc
property.default: I can help you to explore which Access solutions and services will be most effective for your organisation and support you with any commercial queries
property.label: Account manager description

property.name: csmDesc
property.default: I can help you get the most out of your Access software. I can offer continued guidance and advice to ensure you are maximising on the value from your Access tools to make your organisation as successful as possible
property.label: CSM description
